ing: 1 cup fresh spinach, or to taste
2 sprigs fresh parsley, or more to taste
des: "Energizing and refreshing and a simple way to get your greens! Perfect first thing in the morning or as a savory afternoon treat. I like to add a pinch of salt to really bring out the flavors. I sometimes like to kick it up with a chunk of jalapeno pepper thrown in the mix."
ins:
Process lemon, spinach, parsley, celery, jalapeno pepper, and tomato, respectively, through a juicer. Season juice with salt.
Fill a glass with ice and add juice.
